projects.title: Sayfyho memorial
projects.description: A comprehensive web application for the Sayfy memorial cycling race organizers, featuring race promotion, news updates, and photo galleries. Built with Next.js frontend and Express.js backend for optimal performance and user experience.

projects.title: Volba Pro! Teplice
projects.description: Official website for the Volba pro! Teplice political party, providing comprehensive information about their platform and activities. Developed with Next.js frontend and Express.js backend for modern, responsive user experience.

projects.title: Živé Teplice
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for the Živé Teplice cultural event, enabling seamless participant registration, artist showcase capabilities, and event management. Features include user authentication, product/art presentation, news management, photo galleries, and administrative tools for organizers. Built with Next.js frontend and Express.js backend for scalability and performance.

projects.title: Moje CV
projects.description: A modern, interactive personal portfolio showcasing professional experience, skills, and projects. Features a sleek terminal-style interface with dynamic content loading and responsive design. Built with React 19, Express.js and TypeScript for optimal performance and developer experience.
